Hi Alan,

On Feb 15, 2007, at 11:29 AM, Alan Dean wrote:
> http://www.soafacts.com/
Thanks!  That was precious.  My favorite (especially in the context  
of this group :-) is:

> Ancient lore promises the day when a single unifying technology  
> will bring openness and peace to all lands. That technology is not  
> SOA. because SOA killed that technology.

:-)

-- Ernie P.
